translations: 盈利能力；收益性；利益率

phrs.translation: 获利能力分析；盈利分析

sentences.sentence: The best argument for efficiency is its cost—or, more precisely, its profitability.
sentences.translation: 提高效率的最佳理由是它的成本——或者更准确地说，是它的盈利能力。

sentences.sentence: By motivating customers to patronize all three, we will thus contribute to the profitability of each and maximize our return.
sentences.translation: 通过鼓励客户光顾这三家公司，我们将为每一家公司的盈利做出贡献，并使我们的回报最大化。

sentences.sentence: Seventy-four percent of the respondents surveyed report a "good to excellent" expectation of real-estate profitability in 2015.
sentences.translation: 74%的受访者表示，他们对2015年房地产盈利能力的预期为“良好到极好之间”。
